entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow overnight. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
